data.name: Jimmy and the LUX5000 - Awesomenauts Character
data.detailed_description:
Purchasing Jimmy and the LUX5000 will permanently unlock this character in Awesomenauts. The character can also be purchased with Awesomepoints in-game.

Jimmy and the LUX5000 is a moderately-challenging fighter that uses a 3-hit combo melee attack and can charge forward, knocking enemies away. Additionally, the character can unleash a rocket barrage. He comes equipped with the following abilities:

  • Charge in a straight line to knock enemies back and deal damage.
  • Enter a missile barrage mode and unleash long-ranged missiles onto your enemies.
  • The LUX5000 smashes its rattle arms to the ground. Each third smash unleashes a rattle area effect that damages enemies in an area around you.

Jimmy, Amy and the LUX5000 Toddletron are a mighty team. They have won numerous fights in robobrawls held in the many arenas and slums of Circuit City on Calias. The twins love to crush enemies and cause mayhem with the Toddletron's metal wrecking balls, which are basically two big rattles from their perspective. After each won fight Jimmy and Amy share a bottle of the finest Bovinian milk and watch cartoons before nap-time.

Being big fans of the Awesomenauts they skipped the seasonal diaper league tournament and joined the team for some grown up fights.

data.short_description: Jimmy and the LUX5000 is a moderately-challenging fighter that uses a 3-hit combo melee attack and can charge forward, knocking enemies away. Additionally, the character can unleash a rocket barrage.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Lion 10.7 or later.
  • Processor: Any Processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection

  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
